name: Trashy Island
description:
Oh Golly Gosh Sire! The Sea's Are Full Of Shit! You Need To Clean Them Up... Or Your A Muppet!!!! 

Collaborators: https://childdev.itch.io/thicccrick

Trashy Island is a Classic Game Made In Collaboration With ChildDev, We Spent 4 weeks starting it off but decided to actually work on it 8 days when it's submitted.

We Also Posted This Due Storm Arwen, We Risked Our Lives Posting This Game, Install Now! Or I Will Mention You Live On 42 Webster Island!!
